items.title: DEVREL Front
items.description: I designed and developed the responsive UI/UX by using mainly Next.js, TypeScript and Mantine
items.content: The purpose of this project is providing high-quality tech blogs written by curated IT companies in Korea. I designed the site using Figma, developed the front UI/UX. When it was v.1, I styled every components by Emotion, which is a css-in-js library. Whearas in v.2, I adopted Mantine, figured out that it helped me to work efficiently and quickly with high and stable quality. Furthermore, I experienced Git and git-fork to control branches with co-operators to preserve main branch and avoid any conflicts.

items.title: DX Spirnt Awarded
items.description: Awarded Best Product prize by Hacker-ton: DX Challange in Busan during 14 days.
items.content: I participated a Hacker-ton event took place in Busan, from 5th August to 19th 2022. I created the main design and developed a responsive front-end based on Atomic Design System by using Next.js, Typescript and axios. This was the best oppurtunity to test myself as a front-end developer. Moreover, I was able to achived confidence through developing the product under pressure with very intensively limited environment.

items.title: Web Developer(HTML, CSS, JS)
items.description: I designed and created website pages considering clients' requests with strong understanding of HTML, CSS and JS.
items.content: I played a junior web developer role with basic competence in scripting using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I created demonstrating web site pages with mock data. I experienced git to co-operate coworkers. I learnt how to manage my agile work flow, communicate and synchronise with  colleagues to prevent misunderstanding.

items.title: Web Design
items.description: I designed e-commerce promotning images of the products, managed stocks and e-commerce platforms.
items.content: I made product promotion images by photoshop, illustrator, I managed product stock by ordering to restock and preparing packages for custormers.

items.title: Educated Web Developer
items.description: I have strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript(ECMA6).
items.content: Returned to South Korea, I signed the web developer education course supported by government. After graduated the course, I was able to be proficient in web markup, including HTML5 and CSS3, creating landing pages in implementing fully responsive designs.

items.title: Language & Working Holiday
items.description: Achieved IELTS Academic 6.5 level, perfomed as a barista at  Columbus Coffee - the NZ local cafe.
items.content: After attending language course, I tested IELTS Academic and gained 6.5 level. As I received working holiday visa, I worked at Columbus Coffee Mt.Wellington branch as a barista over 8 months. Through this experence, I was able to communcate with multi-culture English speaking people, express my opinion confidently, and broaden my idea.
